description: A report-writing assistant built with agno that generates structured reports from user inputs and provided data. It can create executive summaries, detailed sections, and recommendations based on the user's topic, scope, and source material.

input_descriptions.title: Optional report title. If omitted, one will be generated from the topic.
input_descriptions.topic: Main subject or question the report should address.
input_descriptions.audience: Primary audience or stakeholders for whom the report is intended.
input_descriptions.scope: Scope and boundaries of the report (e.g., timeframe, geographic area, aspects to cover).
input_descriptions.sources: Any source material or references the agent should use (URLs, text blobs, citations).
input_descriptions.format_style: Desired style or format (e.g., formal, executive summary, technical, slide bullets).
input_descriptions.length: Desired length or level of detail (e.g., short, medium, detailed, 2 pages).
input_descriptions.deadline: Desired completion time or delivery date (informational, e.g., '2 days').
input_descriptions.include_summary: Whether to include an executive summary section (true/false).
